pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genomic Prediction of Hybrid Performance // Performs genomic prediction of hybrid performance using eight statistical methods including GBLUP, BayesB, RKHS, PLS, LASSO, EN, LightGBM and XGBoost along with additive and additive-dominance models. Users are able to incorporate parental phenotypic information in all methods based on their specific needs. (Xu S et al(2017) doi:10.1534/g3.116.038059; Xu Y et al (2021) doi: 10.1111/pbi.13458).
